DOC.brief_title: Treatment Cocaine Dependence : Comparison Three Doses Dextro-Amphetamine Sulfate Placebo
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blind dose study compare effectiveness three active medication dose dextro-amphetamine sulfate placebo treatment cocaine dependence . Participants randomly assign one four follow dosage dextro-amphetamine sulfate : 0 mg , 40 mg , 60 mg , 80 mg . Participants undergo 2-week stabilization period follow 25-week study period . The study period include administration stable medication dose 21 week , follow 1 week dose reduction , 3 week without medication . All participant receive weekly cognitive behavioral therapy electrocardiogram . Participants give option participate voluntary plasma blood draw Weeks 4 , 8 , 20 schedule follow-up assessment Months 1 3 post-treatment .
